All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BFS
The BFS algorithm that the sharks use to chase the player over the game board.
Board
Draws the map array on the JPanel.
ClickButton
Implements user mouse inputs.
Coin
A type of collectible the player collects to gain points.
Collectible
A type of entity that the player collects to gain points and open the level exit.
DefaultGameFactory
Contains methods for creating and updating game levels.
direction
The directions available for movement on the game board.
Diver
The entity which the player controls.
EndMenuLose
Menu that appears upon losing the game.
EndMenuWin
Menu that appears upon winning the game.
Entity
Class to be extended by all subsequent game entities.
eventManager
Listens to keyboard input and manages the tick of the game.
Exit
Game entity used to exit a level.
GameFactory
Used to make the game map and board.
GameInstance
Creates an instance of the game.
gameWindow
Window that is opened when the game runs.
Main
Main class of the program where the game code is executed.
Map
Stores all game entities.
Position
Used as an attribute for entities to track their position on the game map.
Seaweed
A type of entity that hinders the player's progress.
Shark
The main enemy which chases the player.
StartMenu
The start menu.
Tick
Calls the eventManager function every tick period.
tickShark
Controls the shark once every game tick.
Timer
Keeps track of how much time the player spends playing the game.
TreasureChest
Collectible entity which gives the player points.
Wall
A type of entity.
